div.p: Penfield Montessori Academy is a public Montessori school located in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. We offer classes starting at K3. We foster an inclusive environment in which children of all abilities can flourish together in multi-age classrooms.
To enroll your child, please visit our enrollment page to apply online, or print an application and send it to us. Apply soon, space is limited!
